channel.title: Mount on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Mount on TLDRBins

item.title: Mount Share
item.description: nfs smb List share showmount -e <TARGET> $ showmount -e 10.10.11.191 Export list for 10.10.11.191: /home/ross * /var/www/html * Mount share sudo mkdir /mnt/share $ sudo mkdir /mnt/share sudo mount -t nfs <TARGET>:<SHARE> /mnt/share/ $ sudo mount -t nfs 10.10.11.191:/home/ross /mnt/share/ $ ls /mnt/share Desktop Documents Downloads Music Pictures Public Templates Videos Unmount share sudo umount /mnt/share/ $ sudo umount /mnt/share/ Mount share sudo mount -t cifs //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt # Without creds sudo mount -t cifs -o user=,password= //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt # With creds sudo mount -t cifs -o user='<USER>',pass='<PASSWORD>' //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt $ sudo mount -t cifs -o ro,user='localadmin',password='Secret123' //10.

item.title: SMB Enum
item.description: SMB Share Enum nmap sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 <TARGET> $ sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 10.10.11.207 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-09-25 04:53 GMT Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.207 Host is up (0.26s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE 445/tcp open microsoft-ds Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 7.96 seconds Anonymous Login smbmap smbclient impacket smbmap -H <TARGET> --no-banner smbmap -H <TARGET> -u null --no-banner # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ $ smbclient -N -L \\\\10.
